players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
Charlie: "I believe we should focus on finding out who killed Diana last night. Let's work together to gather information and make an informed decision during the vote."

Bob: "I think it's important that we all share any information we may have about last night. Let's remember, the more details we can provide, the better chance we have of identifying the culprit and ensuring justice is served."
You: "I agree we need to work together. Bob, you seem very eager to get everyone to share information - that makes me a bit suspicious. What information do you have to share first?"
